original: Ime kho panāyyāyo sekhiyā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: ime kho panāyyāyo sekhiyāḥ dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ puratas pi pacchatas pi olambentī nivāsenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyo puratas pi pacchatas pi olambentī nivāsessanti seyyathā api gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo ti

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ puratas pi pacchatas pi olambentī nivāsessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ puratas pi pacchatas pi olambentī nivāsentī iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo puratopi pacchatopi olambentī nivāsessanti.
analyzed: kathan hi nāma bhikkhave chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ puratas pi pacchatas pi olambentī nivāsessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu
parimaṇḍalam nivāsessāmi iti sikkhā karaṇīyā ati
parimaṇḍalam nivāsetabbam nābhi maṇḍalam jāṇu maṇḍalam paṭicchādentiyā

original: Yā anādariyaṁ paṭicca purato vā pacchato vā olambentī nivāseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: yā anādariyam paṭicca puratas vā pacchatas vā olambentī nivāseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
